Type.description: The type of augmentation, such as cybernetic, genetic, biological, or neural.

Name.description: The name or designation of the augmentation.

Description.description: A description of the augmentation and its effects on the character.

TL.description: The tech level of the augmentation.

Cost.description: The cost or value associated with obtaining or installing the augmentation.

Mass.description: The mass or weight of the augmentation.

Effects.description: The effects or abilities conferred by the augmentation.

Limitations.description: Any limitations or drawbacks of the augmentation.

SourceReference.description: The reference to the source material or book where the augmentation is described or detailed.
